name: Phase Boots
description: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.

abilities.name: Phase
abilities.description: Increases the wielder's movement speed, and grants them phased movement for a while.
notes: Does not interrupt the caster's channeling abilities upon cast.
Checks the caster's attack range type periodically and updates the movement speed and turn rate bonus immediately.
Turn rate slowing effects still affect the wielder normally.
For melee heroes, it increases the average movement speed by 7.5% and increases the caster base turn rate to 1 for its duration.
For ranged heroes, it increases the average movement speed by 3.75%.
The buff is immediately dispelled, if the item is removed from the main inventory in any way.

additionalInfo: Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of Boots of Speed-based items do not stack, the one with a higher value takes priority.
Stacks with all other movement speed bonus.
